name: ai-chat-md-export
description: CLI tool to convert ChatGPT and Claude chat history to Markdown
author: Suguru Takahashi

scripts.build: bun run build:js && bun run build:binary
scripts.test:binary: bun run build && bun test tests/binary
scripts.test:node: bun run build:js && bun test tests/integration/node-js.test.ts
scripts.test:coverage:html: bun test --coverage && bunx @lcov-viewer/cli lcov coverage/lcov.info -o coverage/html
scripts.deps:size: du -sk node_modules/* node_modules/@*/* 2>/dev/null | sort -nr | head -30 | awk 'BEGIN{print "Package                                        Size    Visual"} {kb=$1; path=$2; gsub(/node_modules\//, "", path); if(kb>1024) {mb=kb/1024; size=sprintf("%.1fM", mb)} else {size=sprintf("%dK", kb)} printf "%-45s %7s  ", path, size; bar_len=int(kb/1000); if(bar_len<1) bar_len=1; if(bar_len>40) bar_len=40; for(i=0; i<bar_len; i++) printf "â–ˆ"; print ""}' && echo && echo "Total: $(du -sh node_modules 2>/dev/null | awk '{print $1}')"
scripts.ci: bun run format && bun run typecheck && bun run lint:check && bun run build && bun run test:coverage && bun run knip
scripts.clean: rm -rf bun.lock node_modules releases dist coverage .*.bun-build tsconfig.tsbuildinfo output/chatgpt/*.md output/claude/*.md && bun install
scripts.clean:build: bun run clean && bun run ci
scripts.example:all: bun run example:chatgpt && bun run example:claude
scripts.example:all:binary: bun run example:chatgpt:binary && bun run example:claude:binary
